name: @xiangnanscu/prisma-include
description: a prisma file preprocessor that mixins fields by @import and @include comments

scripts.push: git add . && git commit -am "${msg:-push}" && git push --push-option=${push_option:-nothing}
scripts.replace: find .  -type d \( -name .git -o -name node_modules \) -prune -o  -type f  -exec  sed -i s/prisma-include/prisma-include/g {} \;

author: Nan Xiang
